enum eQCWWANError PkQmiWdsGetMipMode ( WORD *  pMlength,
BYTE *  pParamField 
)

This function packs the GetMobileIP parameters to the QMI message SDU.

Parameters:
pParamField [OUT] - Pointer to storage into which the packed data will be placed by this function.
pMlength [OUT] - Total length of built message.
Returns:
eQMI_ERR_NONE
eQMI_ERR_NO_MEMORY
enum eQCWWANError UpkQmiWdsGetMipMode ( BYTE *  pMdmResp,
struct QmiWdsGetMipModeResp *  pApiResp 
)

This function unpacks the GetMobileIP response message to a user-provided response structure.

Parameters:
pMdmResp - Pointer to packed response from the modem.
pApiResp - Pointer to storage to unpack into.
Returns:
eQCWWAN_ERR_NONE, on success
